'''''The Fairy Knight Twins''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Local Legend]]s Angelica and Medoro, The Fairy Knight Twins.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Fairy Knight Twins ''Angelica'' and ''Medoro'' can be found located northeast of the [[Pale Forgotten Glory]] domain.
<gallery>
Achievement The Fairy Knight Twins Location.png|Map Location
Achievement The Fairy Knight Twins Location Context.png|Location Context
</gallery>

==Trivia==
{{w|Angelica and Medoro}} are two characters from ''{{w|Orlando Furioso}}'', a 16th-century Italian epic poem by Ludovico Ariosto.
